content: this is a civil case that was heard in court the court has made a final resolution regarding the division of property between two parties in a divorce case the court has awarded the applicant ownership of half of the apartment and some other items while the defendant will take possession of the other half of the apartment and the remaining items the court has also ordered the defendant to pay compensation to the applicant for transferring some of the property to a third person without their consent the court has dissolved the marriage between the parties the specific names of the parties involved are not mentioned
